page.title: 20TELEVISION IN THORNTON CLEV.
page.content: TODAY MOST PEOPLE HAVE TELEVISION IN THEIR HOMES.A LOT OF PEOPLE WATCH T.V. FOR ABOUT EIGHT OR NINE HOURS A DAY.IF THERE IS SOMETHING LIKE A LIVE SHOW AND YOU CAN NOT GO AND SEE IT YOU CAN WATCH IT AT HOME INSTEAD.TELEVISION IS EDUCATIONAL AS WELL AS SERIOUS AND FUNNY OR SCARY.IT CATCHES YOU UP ON THE LATEST NEWS,SOME PEOPLE WHO DONT GET THE NEWSPAPER CAN SEE WHATS HAPPENING ON T.V.INSTEAD.MY FAVOURITE PROGRAMME IS Â£TOP OF THE POPS'BECAUSE I LIKE POP MUSIC. MOST PROGRAMMES TODAY ARE SOAP OPERAS LIKE Â£DALLAS'OR CRIME.SOME OF THE THE PROGRAMMES LIKE THAT SHOULD BE REPLACED BY BETTER PROGRAMMES,BUT T.V.IS GOOD THOUGH. I WONDER WHAT T.V. WILL BE LIKE IN 50YEARS TIME?WILL THERE BE A T.V.? BY{ CLARE EMERY.}
